blogs.title: Blog website by Tamizh
blogs.subject: create a blog posting and retriving website using react
blogs.content:
2. Expense Tracker with Charts
Manage daily expenses, visualize spending with pie and bar charts.

Frontend: React + Chart.js

Backend: Django REST / Node.js + Express

Database: PostgreSQL / MongoDB

Features: JWT Auth, user dashboard, category-wise analysis

GitHub: Two repos (client/server) with readme

Deployment: Vercel (frontend), Railway (backend)
blogs.author: selvan
